item.title: [macOS] mac os çª—å£ä¸å®šæ—¶å¤±ç„¦çš„é—®é¢˜
item.description:
è¿™æ®µæ—¶é—´ä¸çŸ¥é“ä»€ä¹ˆè½¯ä»¶æœ‰å†²çªï¼Œæ€»æ˜¯å‡ºç°çª—å£è«åä¹‹å¦™å¤±å»ç„¦ç‚¹çš„é—®é¢˜ï¼Œå°¤å…¶æ˜¯æ‰“å­—çš„æ—¶å€™ï¼Œæœç´¢äº†ä¸€ä¸‹ï¼Œå‘ç°ä»¥ä¸‹ä»£ç ï¼Œä½†ä¸çŸ¥é“æ€ä¹ˆè¿è¡Œï¼Œæœ‰æœ‹å‹èƒ½æ•™æˆ‘ä¸€ä¸‹å—ï¼Ÿ
#!/usr/bin/python
try:
from AppKit import NSWorkspace
except ImportError:
print("Can't import AppKit -- maybe you're running python from brew?")
print("Try running with Apple's /usr/bin/python instead.")
exit(1)

from datetime import datetime
from time import sleep

last_active_name = None
while True:
active_app = NSWorkspace.sharedWorkspace().activeApplication()
if active_app['NSApplicationName'] != last_active_name:
last_active_name = active_app['NSApplicationName']
print('%s: %s [%s]' % (
datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S'),
active_app['NSApplicationName'],
active_app['NSApplicationPath']
))
sleep(1)
